item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Quick Start # Prepare at least two clusters for demonstration Can be a cluster of one node or a cluster of Kind but at least two. Download ferryctl # ferryctl is the installation and operation tool for ferry A ferryctl needs to be installed for each cluster’s control node https://github.com/ferry-proxy/ferry/releases Initialize control plane # # execute on control plane ferryctl control-plane init Declares to the control plane which data plane needs to join # # execute on control plane to pre join other data plane ferryctl control-plane join cluster-1 If the network environment is more complex, please refer to Join Mode
